name: ミンク
message: "...Hear me, mother. Hear me, father. Hear me, brothers, sisters, friends. Hear me, spirits of our ancestors. Father Sun and Mother Earth. Hear me."

name: ミンク
message: "At last, my long journey has come to a close. May our land be cleansed and purified of our blood."

name: ミンク
message: "May new life grow from the ashes of our forest."

name: ミンク
message: "Ancestors. The time has come to embark on my second journey. I shall bring our most holy treasure to your side."

name: ミンク
message: "Thank you for watching over me for so long. Just a little longer..."
